DOC.brief_summary: The investigator try determine single dose Ticagrelor increase delivery intraarterially-infused adenosine forearm interstitium , consistent adenosine reuptake blockade .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Ticagrelor vs. Dipyridamole Adenosine Uptake
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator compare adenosine interstitial level use parallel design study three group subject . Forearm interstitial adenosine level measure baseline intrabrachial infusion adenosine two dos . Subjects randomly receive Ticagrelor 180 mg , Dipyridamole 200 mg , placebo . Two hour later investigator repeat dialysate collection baseline adenosine infusion .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Subjects healthy volunteer , without significant pulmonary , cardiovascular gastrointestinal , hematological renal disease 2 . Not take regular medication 3 . Able provide sign consent prior study participation . 1 . History asthma 2 . Pregnancy 3 . Exposure investigational drug last 2 month . 4 . Known hypersensitivity study medication
